attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Influence Fifa/FA to change FA Law 11 -Offside, back to what it was.  This removes the doubt of off side which is caused by "phases of play", and is ruining the game.  This same rule was misinterpreted and so resulted in West Ham being cheated out of three points against Newcastle this season.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
